name: Doki Doki Zero Bitches Plan
storyline: It's a seemingly normal day at the Literature Club, until Monika brings a strange guest...
summary: Doki Doki: Zero Bitches Plan is a hilarious and satirical mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that puts the player in the role of a protagonist (MC) desperate to finally get a girlfriend. Inspired by the famous “Zero Bitches?” meme, the mod plays on the MC's lack of charm and social skills, turning his romantic journey into a sequence of comical failures and disastrous attempts to win over the girls in the club.
